thread.title: Oscar Pistorius to be released from prison next week: report
thread.title_full: Oscar Pistorius to be released from prison next week: report - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Oscar Pistorius to be released from prison next week: report
text:
Themba Hadebe/AP Oscar Pistorius is reportedly set to be released from prison early next week. Oscar Pistorius is set to be freed from prison early next week, according to reports.
The double-amputee Olympian will be moved to house arrest after his release on Tuesday, the South African parole board announced Thursday, according to BBC News .
Pistorius, 28, was sentenced to five years in prison last October after being convicted of culpable homicide for the 2013 shooting of his model girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp.
The disabled South African sprinter has served one-sixth of his sentence.
He was initially approved to be released and moved to house arrest in August.
This is a developing story. Check back for more updates.
AP This is the Kgosi Mampuru Correctional Services prison in Pretoria, South Africa, where Oscar Pistorius was sentenced to five years imprisonment for killing his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp in 2013. mchan@nydailynews.com
